title: Joseph E Michaelis
text: User interface design, implementation, and evaluation: user-centered design methodologies, I/O techniques, event-loop programming, user studies. Programming projects.
Special topics course in Learning Sciences including a Speaker Series and discussion of current issues and culture in the discipline.
